T02TD3505E:154b-1: bi shva m'a t'a s'a dha nam /
T02TD3505E:154b-3: sna tshogs yum gyi sgrub thabs /
T02TD3505E:154b-4: sna tshogs yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3505E:154b-5: nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su a'a li k'a li dang bcas chu yi sa bon nyid la chu skyes bsgom //
T02TD3505E:154b-6: de yis bskyed pa'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gi chu skyes gnyis pa sku mdog zla ba lta bu ste //
T02TD3505E:154b-7: gdengs ka dkar po la gnas chu skyes dkar po'i phyag dang mi 'jigs pa dang na bza' dkar po mnabs //
T02TD3505E:154b-8: rgyan rnams dkar po dang ldan zhal ni shin tu 'dzum zhing bsgrub bya'i khyim du rab tu bsrings nas ni //
T02TD3505E:155a-0: de nas bsgrub bya blangs nas slar yang gtso bo'i dkyil @155a * //
T02TD3505E:155a-1: 'khor lo ni yang dag rab tu zhugs gyur nas //
T02TD3505E:155a-2: gtso bo'i bka' yis rab tu thob pa'i slar yang bdud rtsi bum pas spyan ma la sogs rab dgyes pas //
T02TD3505E:155a-3: bsgrub bya de la khrus mdzad rab mchog nus ma rnam pa bcu po rnams kyis yang dag mchod par byed /
T02TD3505E:155a-4: gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rgyas byed rab mchog stobs bcu la sogs rnams kyis mnyes par byed //
T02TD3505E:155a-5: 'byung por bshad pas mi 'jigs byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi khro bo las skyes rnams kyis skyong //
T02TD3505E:155a-6: kru mo rnams kyis 'o ni yang dag byed cing mi yi bu mo lo ni bcu gnyis ma pang 'khyud //
T02TD3505E:155a-7: gtum po rnams kyis srung bar byed cing sa steng mtha' dag rnams su rgyas par bya ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD3505E:155a-8: de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma lus mchog gi bde ba bya phyir 'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
T02TD3505E:155a-9: sna tshogs yum gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
